name.baseName: Soy sauce type white wine ; Sorghum, rice, etc. ; Solid state fermentation + filling ; 2000~5000 kl/a; NESPS2
酱香型白酒 ; 高粱、稻米等 ; 固态发酵+灌装 ; 2000～5000千升/年 ; 全国第二次污染普查数据

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution chemical oxygen demandisPhysical treatment + chemical treatment + aerobic biological treatment + anaerobic biological treatment，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management98.71

technology.technologyDescriptionAndIncludedProcesse: the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution chemical oxygen demandisPhysical treatment + chemical treatment + aerobic biological treatment + anaerobic biological treatment，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management98.71
technology.technologicalApplicability: 该工业过程描述的是使用高粱、稻米等原料通过固态发酵生产酱香型白酒的过程，产能在2000到5000千升每年不等。这种酱香型白酒通常用于市场上对酱油风味白酒有需求的消费。此外，数据集包括了不同末端治理技术的详细信息，适用于食品饮料工业，特别是针对生产过程中的化学需氧量（COD）、氨氮、有机结合氮、总磷和废水的治理。

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: 第二次全国污染源普查产排污核算系数手册（试用版）,二级代码15,四级代码1512文件，在完整版文件中第3413页

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: This dataset is derived from the Pollution Source Census Report and contains information on pollution emissions and related products. However, it does not include data on energy or chemical consumption, nor does it provide information on waste or co-product generation. When utilizing this dataset, please supplement the missing data based on actual conditions before use
该数据集来源于污染源普查报告，包含污染物排放及相关产品信息，但不包含能源或化学品消耗数据，也不提供废弃物或共生产物产生信息。在使用该数据集时，请根据实际情况补充缺失数据后再使用。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

common:referenceToPersonOrEntityGenerati.common:shortDescription: The data was created by the Office of the Second National Pollution Source Census of the Ministry of Ecology and Environment, and the data was organized by the TianGong Plan team for ILCD format
生态环境部第二次全国污染源普查工作办公室创建数据，天工计划团队常慧敏整理数据为ILCD格式

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses

exchange.generalComment: nan
源文件中描述为为酱香型白酒，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流，污染物指标备注为化学需氧量

the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution phosphorus, totalisPhysical treatment + chemical treatment + aerobic biological treatment + anaerobic biological treatment，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management96.18
污染物指标总磷的末端治理技术是物理处理法+化学处理法+厌氧生物处理法+好氧生物处理法，其效率为96.18，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=污水处理设施耗电量（千瓦时/年）/(总额定功率（千瓦）×年运行时间（小时/年）)。原文件中描述污染物类别为废水，污染物指标为总磷，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流，污染物指标备注为总磷

the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution phosphorus, totalisPhysical treatment + anaerobic biological treatment + aerobic biological treatment，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management95.76
污染物指标总磷的末端治理技术是物理处理法+厌氧生物处理法+好氧生物处理法，其效率为95.76，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=污水处理设施耗电量（千瓦时/年）/(总额定功率（千瓦）×年运行时间（小时/年）)。原文件中描述污染物类别为废水，污染物指标为总磷，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流，污染物指标备注为总磷
the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution Waste wateris/，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management0
污染物指标工业废水量的末端治理技术是/，其效率为0，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为/。原文件中描述污染物类别为废水，污染物指标为工业废水量，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流，污染物指标备注为工业废水量

the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution Ammonia NitrogenisPhysical treatment + anaerobic biological treatment + aerobic biological treatment，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management93.52
污染物指标氨氮的末端治理技术是物理处理法+厌氧生物处理法+好氧生物处理法，其效率为93.52，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=污水处理设施耗电量（千瓦时/年）/(总额定功率（千瓦）×年运行时间（小时/年）)。原文件中描述污染物类别为废水，污染物指标为氨氮，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流，污染物指标备注为氨氮
